parameters.name: Diameter
parameters.description: Diameter > 0.0 to change; 0.0 to not change

parameters.name: Flip
parameters.description: True to flip the belt side, false to not

title: IBeltChainFeatureData.ModifyMemberParameters
description: Changes diameter and whether to flip the belt side of the specified pulley component.
signature:
System.Boolean ModifyMemberParameters( 
   System.Object
PulleyCompObject
,
   System.Double
Diameter
,
   System.Boolean
Flip
)

parameters.name: Diameter
parameters.description: Diameter > 0.0 to change; 0.0 to not change

parameters.name: Flip
parameters.description: True to flip the belt side, false to not

returns: True if pulley component successfully modifed, false if not
